meanings.definition: A substance that causes decay or decomposition.
meanings.sent1: The putrefier in the old fruit attracted flies.
meanings.sent2: The putrefier in the garbage bin made the whole room smell bad.
meanings.sent3: The putrefier in the compost bin was like a stinky magician turning food into soil.
meanings.sent4: The putrefier in the swamp worked its magic on the fallen leaves.
meanings.sent5: The putrefier in the abandoned house created a scene straight out of a horror movie.

meanings.definition: One who promotes or accelerates putrefaction.
meanings.sent1: The careless cook became a putrefier when he left food out for too long.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the role of a putrefier in the decomposition process.
meanings.sent3: The putrefier at the picnic was the one who forgot to pack the cooler.
meanings.sent4: The negligent farmer acted as a putrefier by not properly disposing of the animal remains.
meanings.sent5: The curious child unintentionally became a putrefier by mixing different foods in a jar and forgetting about it.
